title: Manchester United v Chelsea: Premier League – live
summary: Scott Murray provides a detailed update on a significant evening for Ruben Amorim at Old Trafford, highlighting key moments and developments. Expect insights into Amorim's impact and performance during the event. Stay tuned for minute-by-minute coverage.

title: British couple detained by Taliban in Afghanistan return to UK
summary: Barbie Reynolds, 76, and her husband Peter, 80, have been released after spending nearly eight months in detention without any charges. Their prolonged captivity raised concerns about legal rights and due process. The couple's release marks a significant development in their case.

title: France 17-35 England: Women’s Rugby World Cup 2025 semi-final – live reaction
summary: Ellie Kildunne scored two tries, helping England secure a victory against France. This win allows England to advance to the World Cup final. They will face Canada in the championship match.

title: Brighton 2-2 Tottenham, Wolves 1-3 Leeds, West Ham 1-2 Crystal Palace and more: football – as it happened
summary: Tottenham Hotspur staged a comeback to earn a 2-2 draw against Brighton after being down 2-0. Meanwhile, West Ham and Wolverhampton faced disappointment from their home fans following poor performances. The results highlight the struggles of both West Ham and Wolves amidst rising tensions among supporters.

title: Van Hecke own goal completes Tottenham fightback as Brighton blow two-goal lead
summary: Tottenham salvaged a 2-2 draw against Brighton after Jan Paul van Hecke's late own goal. Brighton had initially taken a strong lead with two goals but failed to maintain their advantage. The match ended in disappointment for Brighton as they dropped points after being in control.
